resources.string:
"

lWS QR

This program was designed as a QR Code plugin for the lightweight Web Server (lWS). It can also be used by itself as a small and simple QR code generator. Start by entering text in the text area below or paste it from clipboard and press 'Encode' button to see QR code. To see this text again press 'Clear' button. lWS QR can be easyly integrated with your application. Source code and aditional information available here"
